localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Turn your code in to beautifully images. Choose from a range of syntax colors, hide or show the background, and toggle between a dark and light window. Use keyboard shortcuts to speed up your process. Built by the team at Raycast.
nodes.title: Ray.so by Raycast - Create beautiful images of your code

nodes.excerpt: Text Compare lets you instantly see the difference between two pieces of text. Compare text by paragraph, word or character. Paste in two pieces of text, and Text Compare will highlight what has been inserted in, or deleted from, the original text.
nodes.title: Text Compare - Instantly see the difference between two pieces of text
nodes.author: Alastair Byrne

nodes.excerpt: I was getting tired of waiting for uploads to convert mywebm files tomp4 files. That's why I made WEBM To MP4! There's no ads, no uploads, and no watermarks. Just select your local file, convert, & download! ğŸ¤¯

nodes.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.

nodes.excerpt: Email clients like Gmail have intelligent algorithms & know your email sending history. When you make an email marketing mistake they put you in the SPAM Jail. To come out you need to establish good sender reputation & WarmupYourEmail helps you do that.
nodes.title: Warmup Your Email - Always land in Inbox by establishing sender reputation
nodes.author: Kevin William David
